alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Putnam; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Slow-moving thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Whiteside, Bureau, northeastern Henry and northeastern Putnam Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking slow-moving thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mendota to 6 miles south of Walnut to Hooppole. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wyanet, Princeton, Tiskilwa, Hennepin, DePue, Sheffield, Buda and Bureau Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 35 and 73. Interstate 180 between mile markers 5 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
